name: Plain Easy Read Limited
goal:
To provide accessible and inclusive services.

EasyRead.info was founded in 2017 to prove that people didn’t need to compromise when producing accessible documents – that modern, innovatively designed information can be better, person-centred and more suitable than traditional approaches. Today, EasyRead.info designs not only inclusive documents but also produces audio & bespoke projects upon demand.
interests: Communication, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: Inclusion, Disability Rights, Accessible Information, Policies impacting vulnerable groups, Disability Discrimination, Accessibility.
